verses.roman:
ei kṛṣṇa--vraje 'pūrṇatama' bhagavān
āra saba svarūpa--'pūrṇatara' 'pūrṇa' nāma

synonyms: ei kṛṣṇa—the same Kṛṣṇa; vraje—Vṛndāvana; pūrṇa-tama bhagavān—the most complete manifestation of the Supreme Personality of Godhead; āra—other; saba—all; sva-rūpa—forms; pūrṇa-tara—more complete; pūrṇa—complete; nāma—named.
translation: "Lord Kṛṣṇa is the most complete Supreme Personality of Godhead in Vṛndāvana. Elsewhere all His expansions are either complete or more complete.
